function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven responses and equivocal commitments to change","Impact":"Prolonged struggle for survival among millions living in poverty","Mitigation":"strengthening commitment to change and ensuring more equal responses","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Millions living in poverty","Owner":"Governments of representative democracies"},{"Description":"Lack of effective vaccine","Impact":"Continued hampering of economic activity","Mitigation":"Further efforts to pursue public health measures and investments in reducing exposure to SARS-COV-2","Technologies":"Public health measures, vaccine development","People":"Global population","Owner":"Health organizations, governments"}]}
